author: Special Correspondent
text:
A private bus passenger died and 20 others were injured after the vehicle overturned on the Pudukottai-Karambakudi road near Thirumananjeri in the district on Tuesday.

The accident occurred at around 3.15 p.m. when the bus with around 50 passengers on board was on its way to Karambakudi from Pudukottai. Police sources said a two-wheeler rider suddenly came on to the main road from a junction point leading to the accident.

The bus driver tried to avoid hitting the two-wheeler and in the melee apparently lost control.

The vehicle hit a milestone on the roadside and thereafter an electric post and overturned.

One of the passengers K. Chinnathambi (40) of Karambakudi died on the spot in the accident which caused injuries to 20 others.

Admitted

The injured were rushed to Government Hospital in Pudukottai for treatment. The two-wheeler rider abandoned the vehicle and escaped from the spot.

The Karambakudi police are investigating.
title: One dies as bus overturns
